title: Location
fullText:
Connectable electrical installation batteries installed externally shall comply with the following requirements:
(a) The battery shall be placed to allow for easy access for maintenance or removal.
(b) Connections shall be insulated unless the connectable electrical installation battery is provided with an insulating device.
(c) The battery shall be secured to prevent movement and restrained not to move more than 25 mm in any direction when a pulling force of twice the battery weight is applied through the centre of gravity of the battery vertically and horizontally.
(d) Be provided with sufficient mechanical protection to prevent damage from rocks and debris while the connectable electrical installation is in motion.
